availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Roland Thomas Vories (Carroll County sheriff and farmer)

body.p: Kentucky-born Carroll County sheriff and farmer.

bibl.p: "An Act for the benefit of R.T. Vories, sheriff of Caroll County," in Acts of the General Assembly of the Commonwealth of Kentucky (Frankfort, KY: W.B. Hughes, Public Printer, 1861, 1862, and 1863), 13.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, District 2, Carrollton post office, p. 59.
